snippet: While the authorities investigate how a gun was fired at the hotel, charges against a Brooklyn man who was carrying the firearm are being deferred, an official said.
abstract: New York prosecutors will defer charges while investigation continues into man who inadvertently discharged gun at wedding reception at the Waldorf Astoria hotel; Vladimir Gotlibovsky was initially charged with reckless endangerment, assault and evidence tampering.
lead_paragraph: While the authorities investigate how a gun was fired at the hotel, charges against a Brooklyn man who was carrying the firearm are being deferred, an official said.

headline.main: Charges Deferred After Gun Discharges at Waldorf Astoria
headline.print_headline: Charges Deferred After Gun Discharges at Waldorf Astoria

keywords.value: Waldorf Astoria New York (Manhattan, NY, Hotel)
